name: Dormitory Hentai Clicker
description:
This is a fascinating clicker in which you take on the role of the person in charge of running the dormitory. Your main task is to keep order in the rooms and maintain the appliances, plumbing and other devices used by the dorm residents.
Use your quick reflexes and accuracy of clicks to quickly and efficiently clean rooms and provide residents with everything they need. Each successfully completed click improves your relationship with the dorm residents, and they express their gratitude in the form of various gifts. 🥰

🎮Gameplay:🎮




You must click on objects until they are repaired or destroyed. You get relationship points for doing so, for which you can unlock erotic scenes with your roommates in the gallery.

📷Gallery:




In the game Dormitory Clicker you have the opportunity to visit the Gallery, where you can take a look at all the gifts you have received from the residents of the dormitory. Here you can enjoy beautiful erotic scenes.🔞

🟠Features:


  • 6 girls and 2 boys
  • Colorful animated CG art
  • Gallery.
  • Nice and clear interface
  • Pleasant soundtrack
